entry.title: the ghosts we leave behind
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,004Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 137

Summary: She had died in that suit. Bled in those colors. Burned for the symbol on her chest. And in less than six months Bruce had handed her place to someone else. Not another lost kid who knew the streets, who knew hunger and rage like she did. No. He’d chosen a boy. A boy with wealth, with schooling, with doors that had always been open to him. A boy who fit into Bruce’s world so easily, so seamlessly, while she had scraped and clawed for every scrap of approval. Everything she had never been good enough for—Tim Drake was, by default. The memory still cut. It always would. Because the Joker had lived. Because she had died. And because Bruce had moved on. Her lips curved into a smile, though there was nothing kind about it, her eyes glittering with something brittle. “So you’re the one,” she said softly, bitterly. “My replacement.”Jane Todd came back to Gotham with a bang—or more accurately, the Joker’s head mounted on Arkham’s gates. It was only the beginning of the chaos she intended to bring.

entry.title: fish hook
entry.summary:
Author: prideinmymouth

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,912Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: In these moment, it's easier for Jason to pretend he's Tim than it is to pretend he and Dick are actually family. Jason never got the train surfing or movie nights or phone calls—or the million other things that Tim talks about on those rare occasions when Jason can get him to loosen up and drink with him. All Jason got was a number scrawled on a slip of paper like an afterthought and an assurance that only one of them knew was a lie. It was the same empty promise that he got from every adult growing up, and Jason had learnt not to call long before he met Dick Grayson.orif jason can't have what he wants, neither can tim. (belfry kinktober 2025, day eight: incest kink, voyeurism.)

entry.title: Null Signature
entry.summary:
Author: AiKotoba

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 144,447Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 108

Summary: Dick Grayson has seen monsters before. He just never expected to recognize one. The pit is Gotham’s best-kept secret—an underground arena where bio-engineered beasts fight to the death, and the crowds cheer louder for blood than justice. But it’s not the monsters that pull him in. It’s the man behind one of them. Red Hood doesn’t speak much. Doesn’t take off the helmet. Doesn’t miss. He baits the deadliest creature in the ring like it’s an extension of himself—and maybe it is. Dick was only supposed to observe. Now he can’t look away. Because Wrathnir fights like someone who’s trained. Red Hood watches like someone who’s remembering. And Dick’s starting to think the thing in the cage isn’t the only ghost down here.

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 86,722Chapters: 21/50Kudos: 172

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: Dick bites. It's a problem.
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,542Chapters: 1/23Kudos: 31

Summary: Thanks to batsandbirdbrains (Tumblr) it's now my headcanon that Dick bit as Robin.This is a COLLECTION of oneshots, somewhat related around one thing: Dick bites.Mostly Mature for the biting and violence, though the last chapter is PWP (DickJay). “You bite strange men, you get the rinse,” Batman said. “That’s the rule.” Robin tried to twist away, but Batman levered Robin up onto his feet with one hand, the other aiming the peroxide at Robin’s mouth. Robin clamped his lips tight. Batman’s patience snapped. “Open,” he growled. “Now.”“Mh-mh!” Robin kicked, but Batman hoisted him higher, one hand under Robin’s armpit, the other holding his head in place.“You don’t want hepatitis.” Batman said, voice ticking up a notch.Robin stopped struggling, eyes wide. Batman saw the pause, and loosened his grip - only to make Robin wind out of his grip and start running. The man with the bitten arm moaned.“What the fuck is wrong with you?” he managed, voice thick with pain and shock.Robin deadlooped over him, baring his teeth in a wicked, blood-stained grin.“Don’t grab the Robin,” he said. “That’s the first lesson.” Fully written fic, upload every Wednesday and Sunday!
